dialogue.speaker: Casa
dialogue.text: Okay. So. Before you panic—this isn’t hard.

dialogue.speaker: Casa
dialogue.text: You just push things by standing next to them, pressing in their direction, and then pressing [A].

dialogue.speaker: Casa
dialogue.text: If four or more of the same kind touch, they combine.

dialogue.speaker: Casa
dialogue.text: When they level up enough… they disappear. Cleaned.

dialogue.speaker: Casa
dialogue.text: No timers. No pressure. Just… physics. Emotional physics.

dialogue.speaker: Casa
dialogue.text: One thing though—try not to leave little leftovers.

dialogue.speaker: Casa
dialogue.text: Stragglers pile up. That’s usually how things get messy again.

dialogue.speaker: Casa
dialogue.text: Ah—wait! Please don’t touch that.

dialogue.speaker: Casa
dialogue.text: I know it’s dumb. I just… don’t want anyone else seeing my unmentionables.

dialogue.speaker: Casa
dialogue.text: Press [RB] to switch to me. I’ll handle it.

dialogue.speaker: Casa
dialogue.text: Could you do the dishes?

dialogue.speaker: Casa
dialogue.text: I’ve been… kind of shaky lately. I don’t trust myself not to drop them.

dialogue.speaker: Casa
dialogue.text: Press [RB] to switch back to you.

dialogue.speaker: Casa
dialogue.text: Oh.

dialogue.speaker: Casa
dialogue.text: Yeah. That actually helps.

dialogue.speaker: Casa
dialogue.text: Let's just… leave the furniture where it is.

dialogue.speaker: Casa
dialogue.text: Unless it looks sus. Then we should probably check it out.

dialogue.speaker: Casa
dialogue.text: You didn’t leave anything behind.

dialogue.speaker: Casa
dialogue.text: See? It’s not about doing everything. Just… doing enough.

dialogue.speaker: Casa
dialogue.text: …How did you manage to leave stragglers in the tutorial?

dialogue.speaker: Casa
dialogue.text: I mean. Impressive. Truly.

dialogue.speaker: Casa
dialogue.text: …You know, I wasn’t sure about this whole hugging thing at first.

dialogue.speaker: Casa
dialogue.text: But I think I like it.
